item.title: I-90 West at I-94 East - Yellowstone County
item.description: I-90 West at Exit 456 - I-94 East/Bismarck (North Dakota). Continue west on I-90 for Billings. This is the western terminus of I-94.

item.title: I-90 West - Exit 456
item.description: I-90 west approaching Exit 456 - I-94 East/Bismarck (North Dakota).

item.title: I-90 West - Exit 456
item.description: I-90 west approaching Exit 456 - I-94 East/Bismarck (North Dakota). Continue west on I-90 for Billings.

item.title: I-90 West - Approaching I-94 (Exit 456)
item.description: I-90 West - approaching Exit 456 - I-94 East/Miles City/Bismarck (North Dakota)

item.title: MT-7 South - To MTS-261 and I-94 West
item.description: MT-7 South - To MTS-261 and I-94 West.

item.title: MT-7 South at I-94 East
item.description: MT-7 South at I-94 East to Bismarck (North Dakota). Continue south on MT-7 for MTS-261 and Wibaux.

item.title: I-94 West at MT-7
item.description: I-94 west at MT-7/To MTS-261. MT-7 is signed as “To” MT-7 into Wibaux. The Montana state highway logs list MT-7 as connecting to I-94 at this interchange.

item.title: I-94 West - Exit 242
item.description: I-94 west approaching Exit 242 - MT-7/To MTS-261/Wibaux/Baker.

item.title: I-94 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-94 west. Distance to Wibaux, Glendive, and Billings.

item.title: I-94 West - White Markers Represent Highway Fatalities
item.description: I-94 West - White Markers Represent Highway Fatalities. The American Legion of Montana maintains erects small white crosses along the highways of Montana where a highway fatality has occurred.

item.title: I-94 West - Exit 248
item.description: I-94 west approaching Exit 248 - Carlyle Road.

item.title: I-94 West - Welcome To Montana
item.description: Welcome to Montana on I-94 west. Taken at the North Dakota - Montana state line.

item.title: ND-16 North at I-94 West
item.description: ND-16 North at I-94 West to Billings, Montana.

item.title: ND-16 North at I-94
item.description: ND-16 North at I-94 near Beach. Use I-94 east for Bismarck; I-94 west for Billings (Montana).

item.title: ND-16 North Approaching I-94
item.description: ND-16 North approaching I-94 near Beach.

item.title: N. Central Ave. at ND-16
item.description: N. Central Ave. at ND-16 in Beach. Turn left on ND-16 for I-94 access.

item.title: ND-16 North at Junction at 34th St SW
item.description: ND-16 North at 34th St. SW in Beach. Turn left to continue north on ND-16 and for I-94.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 1 Offramp
item.description: I-94 East on Exit 1 Offramp at ND-16 junction.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 1 Offramp
item.description: I-94 East on Exit 1 Offramp. Turn left for ND-16 north to Williston; turn right for ND-16 south to Beach and Golva.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 1
item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 1 - ND-16/Beach

item.title: I-94 East - Welcome To North Dakota
item.description: Welcome to North Dakota on I-94 east. Taken at the Montana - North Dakota state line.

item.title: I-94 East - North Dakota Tourist Information Center
item.description: I-94 East - North Dakota Tourist Information Center. This sign is located within the state of Montana, about 0.25 miles from the state line.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 248
item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 248 - Carlyle Road. This is the last exit on I-94 eastbound in Montana.

item.title: MT-7 North at 2nd Ave NW
item.description: MT-7 North at 2nd Ave NW in Wibaux. Turn right for access to I-94 east; left for access to I-94 west. This is the only I-94 shield with the MONTANA text that I have seen.

item.title: MT-7 North at 2nd Ave NW (MTS-261).
item.description: MT-7 North at 2nd Ave NW (MTS-261) in Wibaux. Turn right for access to I-94 east via MT-7 north; left for access to I-94 west via MTS-261 north. This is the only I-94 shield with the MONTANA text that I have seen.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 241 Offramp at MTS-261
item.description: I-94 East - Exit 241 offramp at MTS-261. Turn right for MTS-261 south, to MT-7, and the Wibaux Rest Area. Turn left for MTS-261 North. There is no destination city for MTS-261 north, although it parallels the Montana - North Dakota border north to near Sidney.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 241 Offramp
item.description: I-94 East - Exit 241 Offramp at MTS-261/MT-7. Turn right for MT-7 to Wibaux and Baker.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 241
item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 241 - MTS-261/To MT-7/Wibaux/Baker.

item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 236 - Ranch Access.

item.description: Entering Wibaux County on I-94 east.

item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 231 - Hodges Road.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 224
item.description: I-94 East approaching Exit 224 - Griffith Creek/Frontage Road.

item.title: I-94 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-94 east. Distance to Wibaux, Beach (ND), and Bismarck (ND).

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 215
item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 215 - Glendive City Center. This is the eastern end of the Glendive business loop.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 213
item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 213 - MT-16/Glendive/Sidney.

item.title: I-94 East - Use Exit 213 for Regina Canada
item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 213. Use Exit 213 for Regina, Canada (via MT-16 North).

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 210
item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 210 - BL-94/To MT-200S/Glendive/Circle. This is the western end of the Glendive business loop.

item.description: Glendive exits on I-94 east. MT-200S/Circle, MT-16/Sidney, and City Center.

item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 206 - Pleasant View Road.

item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 204 - Whoopup Creek Road.

item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 185 - MTS-340/Fallon.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 176
item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 176 - MTS-253/Terry. Terry is the county seat of Prairie County.

item.title: Powder River Road at I-94 (Exit 169)
item.description: Powder River Road at I-94 (Exit 169). Turn right for I-94 west to Billings; left for I-94 east to Bismarck (North Dakota).

item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 169 - Powder River Road.

item.description: Entering Prairie County on I-94 east.

item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 159 - Diamond Ring.

item.description: I-94 east at Exit 148 - Valley Access

item.title: MT-59 South at I-94 East
item.description: MT-59 South at I-94 East to Bismarck (North Dakota). Continue south on MT-59 to Broadus.

item.title: MT-59 South at I-94 Jct.
item.description: MT-59 South at I-94 Junction in Miles City.

item.title: MT-59 South at I-94 West
item.description: MT-59 South at I-94 West to Billings. Continue under freeway for I-94 East to Bismarck (North Dakota).

item.title: MT-59 South - Miles City
item.description: MT-59 South (Main St.) at Haynes Ave. Turn right to continue south on MT-59 and for I-94 access.

item.title: US-12 West at I-94 West and BL-94
item.description: US-12 West at I-94 West to Billings. US-12 joins I-94 westbound. Continue straight for BL-94 west to Miles City.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 141 Offramp at US-12
item.description: I-94 East - Exit 141 Offramp at US-12. Turn right to continue east on US-12.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 141 Offramp
item.description: I-94 East on Exit 141 Offramp. Turn right for US-12 east to Baker. Turn left for BL-94 West to Miles City.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 141
item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 141 - US-12 East/Miles City/Baker. US-12 leaves I-94 eastbound here. This is the eastern end of the Miles City business loop.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 138
item.description: I-94 east at Exit 138 - MT-59/Miles City/Broadus.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 138
item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 138 - MT-59/Miles City/Broadus.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 135
item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 135 - BL-94/Miles City/Jordan. This is the western end of the Miles City business loop. Miles City is the county seat of Custer County and the 10th largest city in Montana.

item.title: I-94 East - Miles City Exits
item.description: Miles City Exits on I-94 east. The three exits all show the destination city accessed by that exit. The first exit is to Jordan (via MT-59 north), the second exit is to Broadus (via MT-59 south), and the third exit is to Baker (via US-12 east).

item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 93 - US-12 West/Forsyth. US-12 east joins I-94 east to Miles City.

item.description: Forsyth Next 2 Exits on I-94 east. Forsyth is the county seat of Rosebud County.

item.title: Frontage Road at I-94 (Exit 23)
item.description: Frontage Road at I-94 junction. Turn left for the community of Pompeys Pillar. Turn right for I-94 west to Billings; continue over freeway for I-94 east to Miles City.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 23
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 23 - Pompeys Pillar. Pompeys Pillar is a sandstone outcrop, that is special because it has a signature of William Clark, from the Lewis and Clark expedition engraved in it. William Clark named Pompeys Pillar after Sacagawea’s infant son Jean Baptiste, whom Clark had nicknamed Pompey.

item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 14 - Ballantine/Worden.

item.description: First I-94 shield on I-94 eastbound.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 456 - I-94 Jct.
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 456 - I-94 East/Bismarck (North Dakota). Merge right to continue east on I-90 to Sheridan (Wyoming). This is the beginning of I-94. The eastern end of I-94 is the Canadian border at Port Huron, Michigan.

item.title: I-90 East - Exits 455 and 456
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 455 - Johnson Lane, 1 mile. Approaching Exit 456 - I-94 East/Miles City/Bismarck (North Dakota).

item.title: End I-94 West at I-90
item.description: End I-94 west at Exit 0, I-90 East/Sheridan, I-90 West/Billings. I-90 west continues on same piece of roadway.

item.title: I-90 East Exit 455/Exit 456
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 455, Johnson Lane, 1 mile, and approaching Exit 456, I-94 East/Miles City/Bismarck, 2.5 miles.
